title: BLT Breakfast Sandwich
description: A hearty breakfast sandwich featuring crispy bacon, a fried egg, fresh tomato, and crisp lettuce on toasted bread.

instructions.instruction: Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy, about 3-4 minutes per side. Remove and drain on paper towels. Pour off excess fat, leaving about 1 tablespoon in the skillet.
Toast the bread slices in a toaster or the skillet until golden brown.
In the same skillet with the bacon fat, melt butter if using. Crack the egg into the skillet. Fry to your desired doneness, seasoning with salt and pepper. For a runny yolk, cook about 2-3 minutes.
Assemble the sandwich: Place one slice of toast on a plate. Layer with lettuce, tomato slices, the fried egg, and crispy bacon. Top with the second slice of toast.
